::Dollen::

          Dollen stopped, and fell down on his knees, and put his head in
his hands.

           "I....Don't........Know.....What's..Wrong!!!  I..I can't explain
it!!  These visions!!!!  Who is she????  WHO IS SHE?????" Then, suddenly,
images went through Dollen's head.  Images.

          Now, Dollen was inside his own mind.

         The Silver Fox.

        "The Silver Fox," He said, strangely.

        "I have to find the silver fox.........I must find her.......It's my
destiny......." Then, Dollen had more images.

          A spider............A wolf...............A tyrant..........A
fool.........A bond.....A destiny..........Faith and Trust.....

          Then, Dollen said with a firm look on his face, "We have to go
join KitKat and the others."
